definitions.title: adv. not
definitions.body: (BH [[לא]]; Aram. of Têma, Eg., etc., [[לא]]; Nerab [[ל]] (Lzb:301 Cook:Gl. 67); Targum [[לָא]]; Syr. lo0);—not Je 10:11, Da 2:5, Da 2:9, Da 2:10, etc.; before a ptcp. (so rarely in BH,

definitions.title: 1 b
definitions.body: c), Da 2:27, Da 2:43, Da 3:16, Da 4:4, Da 4:6, Da 4:15 +, so v:Da 4:32 [[וְכָל־דָּאְרֵי אַרְעָא כְּלָה חֲשׁיבִין]]; are as men not accounted of (so Bev Behrm Marti, cf. Is 53:8 Targum [[בסירין ולא חשׁיבין]]; > most ‘accounted as nothing,’ for which no analogy, yet cf. Ps 39:6 Targum); sq. [[אִיתַי]], v. [[אִיתַי]]. With inf. and [[לְ]] Da 6:9 [[דִּי לָא לִהַשְׁנׇיׇה]] which it is not to alter = which is not to be altered (cf. v:Da 6:16), Ezr 6:8 (K:§ 67, 1 Dr:§ 202, 2.; cf. Is 35:6 Targum, D:Aram. Dialektproben, p. 1). With interr. [[הֲלָא]] † Da 3:24, Da 4:27, Da 6:13.
